text:
Question 69) Usually, the cells of the human organism perform aerobic breathing, in which the consumption of a glucose molecule generates 38 ATP molecules. However, under anaerobic conditions, the consumption of a cell glucose molecule is able to generate only two ATP molecules.
40 20 0 28 35 42 21 3 4 5 glucose consumption (arbitrary units) Oxygen concentration (arbitrary units) 7 14 21 Which curve represents the glucose consumption profile, to maintain the homeostasis of a cell that is initially in a condition anaerobic and subjected to a gradual increase in oxygen concentration?
TO 1
B) 2
C) 3
D) 4
E) 5
